trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] After installation, the MySQL root password is empty by default.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] After installation, the MySQL root password is empty by default.

trans-unit.source: We recommended that you run **mysql\_secure\_installation**, a script that helps secure MySQL.
trans-unit.target: We recommended that you run **mysql\_secure\_installation**, a script that helps secure MySQL.

trans-unit.source: The script prompts you to change the MySQL root password, remove anonymous user accounts, disable remote root logins, remove test databases, and reload the privileges table.
trans-unit.target: The script prompts you to change the MySQL root password, remove anonymous user accounts, disable remote root logins, remove test databases, and reload the privileges table.

trans-unit.source: We recommended that you answer yes to all of these options and change the root password.
trans-unit.target: We recommended that you answer yes to all of these options and change the root password.

trans-unit.source: Type this to run the script MySQL installation script:
trans-unit.target: Type this to run the script MySQL installation script:

trans-unit.source: After you run, you can log in to MySQL:
trans-unit.target: After you run, you can log in to MySQL:

trans-unit.source: Enter the MySQL root password (which you changed in the previous step) and you'll be presented with a prompt where you can issue SQL statements to interact with the database.
trans-unit.target: Enter the MySQL root password (which you changed in the previous step) and you'll be presented with a prompt where you can issue SQL statements to interact with the database.

trans-unit.source: Note that database user names and passwords are only used by scripts connecting to the database.
trans-unit.target: Note that database user names and passwords are only used by scripts connecting to the database.

trans-unit.source: Database user account names do not necessarily represent actual user accounts on the system.
trans-unit.target: Database user account names do not necessarily represent actual user accounts on the system.

trans-unit.source: To log in from another computer, type:

trans-unit.source: where `ip-address` is the IP address of the computer from which you will connect to MySQL.

trans-unit.source: To exit the MySQL database administration utility, type:
trans-unit.target: To exit the MySQL database administration utility, type:

trans-unit.source: After MySQL is installed, you'll need to configure an endpoint to access MySQL remotely.
trans-unit.target: After MySQL is installed, you'll need to configure an endpoint to access MySQL remotely.

trans-unit.source: Log in to the [Azure Portal][AzurePortal].
trans-unit.target: Log in to the [Azure Portal][AzurePortal].

trans-unit.source: Click **Virtual Machines**, click the name of your new virtual machine, and then click **Endpoints**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Virtual Machines**, click the name of your new virtual machine, and then click **Endpoints**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add an endpoint named "MySQL" with protocol **TCP**, and **Public** and **Private** ports set to "3306".
trans-unit.target: Add an endpoint named "MySQL" with protocol **TCP**, and **Public** and **Private** ports set to "3306".
